messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, I could say I flew from England......even if it was two years ago... Shyrley [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:

>In a message dated 8/9/2003 12:44:29 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
>ecsamhill@... writes:
>
>
>
>
>>I was *really* impressed that you would fly that far
>>for the SC unschooling conference <g>, but I was sure that it would be
>>worth it!
>>
>>
>>
>
>Well, we DO have folks flying in from CA, WA, AZ, & CO as well as Canada &
>Germany! New Zealand *would* win the "Traveled the Farthest" award though! I
>think Brenda owns it right now!
>
>~Kelly
>
>
>
>
Well, I could say I flew from England......even if it was two years ago...

Shyrley

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/9/2003 12:44:29 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Well, we DO have folks flying in from CA, WA, AZ, & CO as well as Canada & Germany! New
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/9/2003 12:44:29 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
ecsamhill@... writes:


> I was *really* impressed that you would fly that far
> for the SC unschooling conference <g>, but I was sure that it would be
> worth it!
>

Well, we DO have folks flying in from CA, WA, AZ, & CO as well as Canada &
Germany! New Zealand *would* win the "Traveled the Farthest" award though! I
think Brenda owns it right now!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
